name: Precision Targeting (V)
Lore: '''Sir, we just lost the main rear deflector shield. One more direct hit on the back quarter and we''re done for!''',
Text: 'Deploy on table. Your capital starship weapon destiny draws are +1. During your deploy phase, may use 1 Force to deploy a starship weapon (for free) on you capital starship from Reserve Deck; reshuffle. If a starship was just hit, may place this Effect in Lost Pile to make that starship forfeit = 0.',
